title: Penske Automotive Group (PAG) Shares Cross Above 200 DMA - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Penske Automotive Group Inc (Symbol: PAG) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $44.29, changing hands as high as $44.41 per share. Penske Automotive Group Inc shares are currently trading up about 4.2% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of PAG shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
